sentences.sContent: But now suppose we approach the question from a -I don't say from an empirical point of view but from a speculative anthropological point of view.
sentences.sContent_eng: But now suppose we approach the question from a -I don't say from an empirical point of view but from a speculative anthropological point of view.
sentences.sCn: 现在假设我们从一个特定角度来看这个问题,我不会说从一个经验主义的角度,而是从一个推测的人类学的角度来看。

sentences.sContent: It seems to me that the idea of a personal God is an anthropological concept which I cannot take seriously.
sentences.sContent_eng: It seems to me that the idea of a personal God is an anthropological concept which I cannot take seriously.
sentences.sCn: 对于我来说，每人心中有一个自己的上帝这一人类学观点，我并没有严肃认真地看待。

words.tran: 人为的；[人类] 人类起源的
以人类为中心的；以人类观点解释宇宙万物的
类人猿的；类人的；（猿等）似人类的
人类起源学的；人类起源的
人类本位说；人类中心说
